comment: It's official, Darkscythe has gone nuts. This is so sad, it makes me want to cry. Sitting through minutes of cringe. Hopefully "The Rise and Fall of Darkscythe" won't be that long. The old Darkscythe wouldn't have given a damn. This was not funny.

      :snt3 (s3 / sit-01

                              :op5 "of"

                  :degree (t2 / that)))
      :snt5 (g2 / give-16
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p3 / product
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Darkscythe")
                  :mod (o2 / old))

      :snt6 (f / funny-02
